00031 #include <SDL.h>
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034     class SDLWindow : public RenderWindow
00035     {
00036     private:
00037         SDL_Surface* mScreen;
00038         bool mActive;
00039         bool mClosed;
00040             
00041         // Process pending events
00042         void processEvents(void);
00043     public:
00044         SDLWindow();
00045         ~SDLWindow();
00046 
00047         void create(String name, int width, int height, int colourDepth,
00048             bool fullScreen, int left, int top, bool depthBuffer, void* miscParam, ...);
00050         void destroy(void);
00052         bool isActive(void);
00054         bool isClosed(void);
00056         void reposition(int left, int top);
00058         void resize(int width, int height);
00060         void swapBuffers(bool waitForVSync);
00061         void outputText(int x, int y, const String& text);
00062     };
